name: Path of Click
description:
-- Gameplay --

Path of Click is a Clicker JRPG! You have to click as fast  as you can to complete the levels and beat the monsters.

The game plays only with right or left clicks. With the right combination of clicks, try to finish the levels as fast as possible. 

 -- Controls --
  • Right or left click : Travelling the levels & beating ennemies
  • Alt + ENTER : Enable or Disable Fullscreen
-- About --

This game was made in 2 days by the following team :

  • D3nX : Programming and Art
  • HydroGene : Programming and Musics

We hope you'll enjoy the game! 

The game was made to be Speedrun, so don't hesitate to show us your time and number of clicks (visible at the end of the game during the outro)!
